name: SpaceSHEEP (DEMBERG)
description:
You are an alien farmer minding his own business - but then the meanie aliens attacked!!  (Or your buddy, but still) 

Your sheep will show them who da boss is! (Worry not, those little buggers will spawn back in place, but after they manage a good hit or two  to your enemies. They'll be fiiiiiiiine. )

Crush the baddies!! (or your buddies) 

Baah victorious!

Instructions
  • Use the Joystick to move your UFO right and left. 
  • Press and hold "A", to collect a sheep. 
  • Press "B" to fire! 
  • Upgrade your attack and be UNBEATABLE!

Your planet counts on you.. (your sheep... not that much). 

Credits
  • Programmer: George Pagkalis
  • Art/Animation: Rea Papadopetrou
  • Sound Design/Music/Additional UI: Denia Palaiologou
